article_title: Supreme Court ace challenges America's highest minimum wage
article_text:

twitter.description: When Seattle’s $15 per hour minimum wage became law in early June, Mayor Ed Murray received praise for brokering discussions between labor and business that gave the city the nation’s h...

article_metadata.news_keywords: Paul Clement, fast food workers, Seattle minimum wage, minimum wage, supreme court, worker pay, interstate commerce
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Supreme Court ace challenges America’s highest minimum wage
article_metadata.description: Lawyer Paul Clement has argued 74 cases before the top court, often for right-wing clients. His latest target: Seattle's $15 minimum wage law.
